title: when is the PBE signup going to be fix???
body:
Is there any date we can get to know when we can sign up for the PBE, because its been 2 months  since it was down and even before that I still could not sign up. Really want to get PBE pls just give me PBE plus. 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I'd like an answer to this too, I wish they could tell us more about it.

I wish I could tell you more too, but I really don't have any info or updates right now.  The PBE is down for extended maintenance and upgrades, but I don't have any updates beyond what's being provided on the [PBE status ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)page.  You'll want to bookmark that for now, but I'll definitely share new info I find.
